messages.subject: Re: Vacation
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 04/11/2002 4:16:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Julian has LOVED the Ranger programs we ve done at ational Parks. There are also programs
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 04/11/2002 4:16:44 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:


> In a message dated 4/11/2002 10:16:02 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
> vivrh@...
> writes:
>
>
> > So being that I am new to the unschooling thing, is there anything else
> that
> > I can do to help them to make the most of this trip?
>
>

Julian has LOVED the Ranger programs we've done at ational Parks. There are
also programs where you buy a little book and do some activities and go on a
program or two, and the kid gets a patc. These have been wonderful, because
each time the Ranger really acknowledges the kids. We've really loved those.
Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
